message.body: New development: Lizzy got us an apartment showing Friday at 1:30 since the landlord could only do weekdays. So your getting here closer to noon than 1 (or Thursday night) would be ideal.
K. I think I'm going to ride Thursday after clinical so I'd leave Friday morning. I'll text you when I know my eta but I'll try to be there between 11 and noon.
Unless you don't mind me showing up late, like midnightish, in which case I could leave Thursday night.
Yeah, either way works. Ill be up :)
What kind of wine do you drink?
Ermmm red or white (or rose!) but not like really dry/serious...I'm not too picky :)
Do you like semi-dry ish? Or super sweet?
Bah sorry I didn't see this. I like Malbec, merlot, Shiraz, Chardonnay, white Zinfandel. Hopefully that gives you a sense? haha Whatever you want is fine :P
Haha okay. I ended up with one of my favorite obscure whites (seyval blanc), and a sweeter table white that i liked the name of :P
Sounds good :)
And they're both from within 45 minutes of school, which is pretty cool.
Awesome! :)
So i take it you are driving down tomorrow? :)
One gas stop and one pee break later, I'm about an hour 15 out. This was not the time i had planned on arriving. Sorry zazu!
Oh goodness. Okay.
Trust me this wasn't my plan either.
No worries! Just call me when you get here :)
pulling in now!
So where did you run off to?
Headed to h&m in a sec
